qpriAggregator.mainSelect:
SELECT /*+ ORDERED FULL(i) FULL(a) FULL(d) USE_HASH(v d a b) */ v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 v.cpod, --1 a.operando, CASE WHEN a.operando='EPB_A_43' THEN TO_CHAR(v.cdsti,'yyyymmdd') WHEN a.operando='ESQP_01_FT' THEN GET_AB_EF_SC_APP(a.operando,a.ctar1,v.cdsti,a.data_validita) WHEN TO_CHAR(v.cdsti,'yyyymmdd') IS NULL THEN get_ab2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.cdsti,data_validita) ELSE TO_CHAR(v.cdsti,'yyyymmdd') END CASE,--3 CASE WHEN a.operando='EPB_A_43' THEN TO_CHAR(v.cdces,'yyyymmdd') WHEN get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.cdsti,v.cdces,data_validita_al) > TO_CHAR (v.cdces,'yyyymmdd') THEN TO_CHAR(v.cdces,'yyyymmdd') ELSE get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.cdsti,v.cdces,data_validita_al) END CASE,---4 valori, --5 NVL(prezzo,0), --6 b.id_operando , --7 tipo , --8 v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR||a.operando --9 --V.CDSTI --10 FROM DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrele v, DBI_USER.ifc_sap_punti_fornitura d, z_prodotto_operando a, z_anagrafica_operandi b WHERE d.dbi_punto_key= v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR AND a.acquisizione= v.cfreq AND d.Frequenza_Misura = v.Cfreq --AND v.Dbi_Original_Key_Pr = 'PR2011209' AND a.ctar1=v.ctar1 AND v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR IN ( SELECT cncon FROM z_test_contratti WHERE note = 'lotto 31') AND a.operando = b.operando AND tipo ='QPRICE' AND CASE WHEN a.operando='EPB_A_43' THEN TO_CHAR(v.cdsti,'yyyymmdd') WHEN a.operando='ESQP_01_FT' THEN GET_AB_EF_SC_APP(a.operando,a.ctar1,v.cdsti,a.data_validita) WHEN TO_CHAR(v.cdsti,'yyyymmdd') IS NULL THEN get_ab2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.cdsti,data_validita) ELSE TO_CHAR(v.cdsti,'yyyymmdd') END <= CASE WHEN a.operando='EPB_A_43' THEN TO_CHAR(v.cdces,'yyyymmdd') ELSE get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.cdsti,v.cdces,data_validita_al) END AND CASE WHEN a.operando='EPB_A_43' THEN TO_CHAR(v.cdsti,'yyyymmdd') WHEN a.operando='ESQP_01_FT' THEN GET_AB_EF_SC_APP(a.operando,a.ctar1,v.cdsti,a.data_validita) WHEN TO_CHAR(v.cdsti,'yyyymmdd') IS NULL THEN get_ab2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.cdsti,data_validita) ELSE TO_CHAR(v.cdsti,'yyyymmdd') END <= TO_CHAR(V.CDCES, 'YYYYMMDD') AND a.operando!='EPB_A_43' and a.operando='ESQP_01_FT' AND Get_Bis2(b.Operando,a.Ctar1,v.cdsti,v.cdces,Data_Validita_Al) > '20080401' GROUP BY v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --1 a.operando, A.DATA_VALIDITA, --2 v.cdsti, --3 get_ab2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.cdsti,data_validita), GET_AB_EF_SC_APP(a.operando,a.ctar1,v.cdsti,a.data_validita), get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.cdsti,v.cdces,data_validita_al), GET_AB_ESQP_01_FT(a.operando,a.ctar1,v.cdsti,a.data_validita), valori, --5 NVL(prezzo,0), --6 b.id_operando , --7 tipo ,v.cpod, v.cdces, --8 v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR||a.operando , A.DATA_VALIDITA, A.DATA_VALIDITA_AL UNION ALL SELECT /*+ ORDERED FULL(i) FULL(a) FULL(d) USE_HASH(v d a b) */ v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 v.cpod, --1 a.operando, cASE WHEN a.operando='EPB_A_43' and A.DATA_VALIDITA = 'EINZDAT' then TO_CHAR(v.cdsti,'yyyymmdd') WHEN a.operando='EPB_A_43' AND A.DATA_VALIDITA > TO_CHAR(v.cdsti,'yyyymmdd') THEN A.DATA_VALIDITA ELSE TO_CHAR(v.cdsti,'yyyymmdd') END CASE,--3 CASE WHEN a.operando='EPB_A_43' AND A.DATA_VALIDITA_al < TO_CHAR(v.cdces,'yyyymmdd') THEN A.DATA_VALIDITA_al ELSE TO_CHAR(v.cdces,'yyyymmdd') END CASE ,---4 valori, --5 NVL(prezzo,0), --6 b.id_operando , --7 tipo , --8 v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR||a.operando --9 -- V.CDSTI --10 FROM DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrele v, z_prodotto_operando a, z_anagrafica_operandi b , DBI_USER.ifc_sap_punti_fornitura d WHERE d.dbi_punto_key= v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR AND a.acquisizione= v.cfreq AND a.ctar1=v.ctar1 AND d.Frequenza_Misura = v.Cfreq AND v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR IN ( SELECT cncon FROM z_test_contratti WHERE note = 'lotto 31') AND a.operando = b.operando AND tipo ='QPRICE' AND CASE WHEN a.operando='EPB_A_43' THEN TO_CHAR(v.cdsti,'yyyymmdd') ELSE TO_CHAR(v.cdsti,'yyyymmdd') END <= TO_CHAR(v.cdces,'yyyymmdd')
AND ( CASE WHEN a.operando='EPB_A_43' and A.DATA_VALIDITA = 'EINZDAT' then TO_CHAR(v.cdsti,'yyyymmdd') WHEN a.operando='EPB_A_43' AND A.DATA_VALIDITA > TO_CHAR(v.cdsti,'yyyymmdd') THEN A.DATA_VALIDITA ELSE TO_CHAR(v.cdsti,'yyyymmdd') END) <= (CASE WHEN a.operando='EPB_A_43' AND A.DATA_VALIDITA_al < TO_CHAR(v.cdces,'yyyymmdd') THEN A.DATA_VALIDITA_al ELSE TO_CHAR(v.cdces,'yyyymmdd') END) AND a.operando='EPB_A_43' AND (CASE WHEN a.operando='EPB_A_43' AND A.DATA_VALIDITA_al < TO_CHAR(v.cdces,'yyyymmdd') THEN A.DATA_VALIDITA_al ELSE TO_CHAR(v.cdces,'yyyymmdd') --ELSE get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.cdsti,v.cdces, -- data_validita_al) END) > '20080401' GROUP BY v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --1 a.operando, A.DATA_VALIDITA, --2 v.cdsti, --3 get_ab2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.cdsti,data_validita), get_ab_ef_sc_app(a.operando,a.ctar1,v.cdsti,a.data_validita), get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.cdsti,v.cdces,data_validita_al), valori, --5 v.cpod, NVL(prezzo,0), --6 b.id_operando , --7 tipo , v.cdces, --8 v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR||a.operando , A.DATA_VALIDITA, A.DATA_VALIDITA_AL -- ORDER BY -- cdsti

FactQpriExtractor.mainSelect: SELECT FACTS_KEY.LEGACY, --0 FACTS_KEY.TIPO,--1 FACTS_KEY.ANLAGE, --2 FACTS_KEY.BIS, --3 facts_f_qprice.legacy, --4 facts_f_qprice.tipo, --5 facts_f_qprice.operand, --6 facts_f_qprice.saison, --7 facts_f_qprice.prog, --8 facts_v_qprice.legacy, --9 facts_v_qprice.tipo, --10 facts_v_qprice.ab, --11 facts_v_qprice.bis, --12 facts_v_qprice.preis, --13 facts_v_qprice.prsbtr, --14 facts_v_qprice.waers, --15 facts_v_qprice.tarifart, --16 facts_v_qprice.kondgir, --17 facts_v_qprice.prog --18 from facts_key,facts_f_qprice,facts_v_qprice where facts_key.legacy = facts_f_qprice.legacy and facts_v_qprice.legacy=facts_key.legacy and facts_f_qprice.legacy=facts_v_qprice.legacy and facts_f_qprice.prog=facts_v_qprice.prog order by facts_f_qprice.prog

LPriceAggregator.mainSelect: select v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 v.CPOD, --1 a.operando, --2 get_ab2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.d_valido_dal,data_validita),--3 get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.d_valido_dal,v.d_valido_al,data_validita_al),--4 valori, --5 nvl(prezzo,0), --6 b.id_operando , --7 tipo --8 from DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrele v, z_prodotto_operando a, z_anagrafica_operandi b ,DBI_USER.ifc_sap_punti_fornitura d where d.dbi_punto_key= v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR and a.acquisizione= v.cfreq and v.ctar1=a.ctar1 and v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR IN (select cncon from z_test_contratti where note = 'lotto 31') and a.operando = b.operando and tipo ='LPRICE' AND Get_Bis2(a.Operando,a.Ctar1,v.cdsti,v.cdces,Data_Validita_Al) > '20080401' group by v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 v.CPOD, --1 a.operando, --2 get_ab2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.d_valido_dal,data_validita),--3 get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.d_valido_dal,v.d_valido_al,data_validita_al),--4 valori, --5 nvl(prezzo,0), --6 b.id_operando , --7 tipo --8 UNION select v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 v.cpod, --1 a.operando, --2 get_ab2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.d_valido_dal,data_validita),--3 get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.d_valido_dal,v.d_valido_al,data_validita_al),--4 valori, --5 nvl(prezzo,0), --6 b.id_operando , --7 tipo --8 from DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrele v, z_prodotto_operando a, z_anagrafica_operandi b ,DBI_USER.ifc_sap_punti_fornitura d where d.dbi_punto_key= v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR and v.ctar1=a.ctar1 and v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR IN (select cncon from z_test_contratti where note = 'lotto 31') and a.operando = b.operando and tipo ='LPRICE' AND Get_Bis2(a.Operando,a.Ctar1,v.cdsti,v.cdces,Data_Validita_Al) > '20080401' group by v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 v.cpod, --1 a.operando, --2 get_ab2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.d_valido_dal,data_validita),--3 get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.d_valido_dal,v.d_valido_al,data_validita_al),--4 valori, --5 nvl(prezzo,0), --6 b.id_operando , --7 tipo

LPriceExtractor.mainSelect: SELECT FACTS_KEY.LEGACY, --0 FACTS_KEY.TIPO,--1 FACTS_KEY.ANLAGE, --2 FACTS_KEY.BIS, --3 FACTS_F_LPRI.LEGACY, --4 FACTS_F_LPRI.TIPO, --5 FACTS_F_LPRI.OPERAND , --6 FACTS_F_LPRI.SAISON, --7 FACTS_F_LPRI.PROG, --8 FACTS_V_LPRICE.LEGACY, --9 FACTS_V_LPRICE.TIPO, --10 FACTS_V_LPRICE.AB , --11 FACTS_V_LPRICE.BIS, --12 FACTS_V_LPRICE.PREIS, --13 FACTS_V_LPRICE.TARIFART, --14 FACTS_V_LPRICE.KONDGIR, --15 FACTS_V_LPRICE.PROG --16 from facts_key,FACTS_F_LPRI,FACTS_V_LPRICE where facts_key.legacy = FACTS_F_LPRI.legacy and FACTS_V_LPRICE.legacy=facts_key.legacy and FACTS_F_LPRI.legacy=FACTS_V_LPRICE.legacy and FACTS_F_LPRI.prog=FACTS_V_LPRICE.prog order by FACTS_F_LPRI.prog

TPriceAggregator.mainSelect: select v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 v.cpod, --1 a.operando, --2 get_ab2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.d_valido_dal,data_validita),--3 get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.d_valido_dal,v.d_valido_al,data_validita_al),--4 valori , --5 nvl(prezzo,0), --6 b.id_operando , --7 tipo --8 from DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrele v, z_prodotto_operando a, z_anagrafica_operandi b, DBI_USER.ifc_sap_punti_fornitura d where d.dbi_punto_key= v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR and a.acquisizione= v.cfreq and v.ctar1=a.ctar1 and v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR IN (select cncon from z_test_contratti where note = 'lotto 31') and a.operando = b.operando and tipo ='TPRICE' AND Get_Bis2(a.Operando,a.Ctar1,v.cdsti,v.cdces,Data_Validita_Al) > '20080401' group by v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR||a.operando||to_char(v.d_valido_dal,'yyyymmdd'), v.DBI_ORIGINAL_KEY_PR, --0 v.cpod, --1 a.operando, --2 get_ab2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.d_valido_dal,data_validita),--3 get_bis2(b.operando,a.ctar1,v.d_valido_dal,v.d_valido_al,data_validita_al),--4 valori , --5 nvl(prezzo,0), --6 b.id_operando , --7 tipo

TPriceExtractor.mainSelect: SELECT FACTS_KEY.LEGACY, --0 FACTS_KEY.TIPO,--1 FACTS_KEY.ANLAGE, --2 FACTS_KEY.BIS, --3 FACTS_F_TPRI.LEGACY, --4 FACTS_F_TPRI.TIPO, --5 FACTS_F_TPRI.OPERAND , --6 FACTS_F_TPRI.SAISON, --7 FACTS_F_TPRI.PROG, --8 FACTS_V_TPRICE.LEGACY, --9 FACTS_V_TPRICE.TIPO, --10 FACTS_V_TPRICE.AB , --11 FACTS_V_TPRICE.BIS, --12 FACTS_V_TPRICE.PREIS, --13 FACTS_V_TPRICE.PRSBTR, --14 FACTS_V_TPRICE.WAERS, --15 FACTS_V_TPRICE.TARIFART, --16 FACTS_V_TPRICE.KONDGIR, --17 FACTS_V_TPRICE.PROG --18 from facts_key,FACTS_F_TPRI,FACTS_V_TPRICE where facts_key.legacy = FACTS_F_TPRI.legacy and FACTS_V_TPRICE.legacy=facts_key.legacy and FACTS_F_TPRI.legacy=FACTS_V_TPRICE.legacy and FACTS_F_TPRI.prog=FACTS_V_TPRICE.prog order by FACTS_F_TPRI.prog
